text: Anastasia Sergeyevna Tikhonova (; born 21 January 2001) is a Russian tennis player. Tikhonova has a career-high WTA singles ranking of 642, achieved on 27 May 2019. She also has a career-high WTA doubles ranking of 481, set on 19 November 2018. Tikhonova has won one doubles title on the ITF Women's Circuit. She made her main-draw debut on WTA Tour at the 2019 Baltic Open, where she received a wild card for the doubles competition partnering Veronika Pepelyaeva. ==ITF finals== ===Singles: 1 (1 runner–up)=== {| class="wikitable" !
